children.name: video_thumbnail
children.label: Video Thumbnail
children.help_text: Must be same aspect ratio as video to avoid resizing when video plays

children.name: row_height
children.label: Row Height
children.help_text: Row Height defines how many rows this column is expanding to. In order to properly work, the rows that is defined here, they need to exists. For example: If 2/12 is selected, make sure there are enough repeatable columns to have 2 rows of content.

children.name: animate_content_only
children.label: Animate Content Only
children.help_text: If the grid Item has a background, with this function, will animate only the content inside.
